overview: Alexis Texas: After seeing her step sister going at it with her boyfriend, Alexis puts herself out there for the taking.  Bree Olson: Fed up that everyone is getting action except her, Bree gets what she needs from a friendly neighbor.  Carolyn Reese: Carolyn has a burning secret but doesn't know how to break the news. Lucky for Herschel, she makes it real easy on him.  Julia Ann: Mother Julia doesn't like her step daughter's boyfriend one bit. She has a plan to get them out of the house for good.  Rachel Starr: Stepdaughter Rachel shows the girls how a real woman takes care of her man by leaving the door open for educational purposes.
title: Filthy Family 3
